title: Selune's Spear of Night
content:
mote (Class Actions) Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Rush Attack Maiming Strike Spear Versatile Thrown

Rush Attack Maiming Strike

Where to Find Selune's Spear of Night in Baldur's Gate 3

This spear can only be acquired if you save the life of the Nightsong and Isobel and turn back on Shar in Shadowheart's personal quest The Chosen of Shar.

Selune's Spear of Night Baldur's Gate 3 Notes & Tips

Rarity: Legendary Value: 640 Gp. Weight: 1.35 Kg. ID: MAG_SHA_SeluneBlessing_Spear UUID:
